name: Binary Input Loader
semantic_context: Use binary data from a previous step in the workflow
natural_language_description: 这是 Binary Input Loader 节点。主要用于: Use binary data from a previous step in the workflow

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to a vector store. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to a vector store. Insert one

loader.name: loader
loader.natural_language_description: 参数名: Loader Type | 默认值: jsonLoader | (必填项)
available_options: CSV Loader (值: csvLoader) - Load CSV files
Docx Loader (值: docxLoader) - Load Docx documents
EPub Loader (值: epubLoader) - Load EPub files
JSON Loader (值: jsonLoader) - Load JSON files
PDF Loader (值: pdfLoader) - Load PDF documents
Text Loader (值: textLoader) - Load plain text files

binaryDataKey.name: binaryDataKey
binaryDataKey.description: Name of the binary property from which to read the file buffer
binaryDataKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary Data Key | 作用: Name of the binary property from which to read the file buffer | 默认值: data | (必填项)

splitPages.name: splitPages
splitPages.natural_language_description: 参数名: Split Pages | 默认值: True

column.name: column
column.natural_language_description: 参数名: Column | 作用: Column to extract from CSV

separator.name: separator
separator.natural_language_description: 参数名: Separator | 作用: Separator to use for CSV | 默认值: ,

pointers.name: pointers
pointers.description: Pointers to extract from JSON, e.g. "/text" or "/text, /meta/title"
pointers.natural_language_description: 参数名: Pointers | 作用: Pointers to extract from JSON, e.g. "/text" or "/text, /meta/title"

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: metadata (值: None) - Metadata to add to each document. Could be used for filtering during retrieval
